description:
The Straw Hats set a course for Dressrosa, Law explains his alliance with Luffy, and Smoker`s refusal to reveal a secret earns him a serious beating from Doflamingo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: G5壊滅! ドフラミンゴ急襲!
Le G-5 anéanti. L’attaque éclair de Doflamingo !
The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo`s Sudden Attack!
